meanings.definition: A long, open, level area, typically beside the sea, where people may walk.
meanings.sent1: The esplanade by the beach was perfect for a leisurely stroll.
meanings.sent2: Families enjoyed walking along the esplanade, taking in the ocean view.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls on the esplanade seemed to be enjoying their own little parade.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the colors reflected on the esplanade, creating a magical pathway.
meanings.sent5: The sound of waves crashing against the esplanade made the evening unforgettable.
